hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #1# major item.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!
